title: Citrusy Cabbage Salad with Cumin and Coriander
directions: Place all ingredients in a large bowl and toss to combine.
Serve alone or as a side to chicken, fish, seafood, or pork. Great served in fish tacos or with pulled pork.
ingredients: 6 cups thinly sliced cabbage, red or green or both
2 large oranges, supremed (sectioned and membranes removed)
